CustomField.description: Developed to help identify cases that may need additional oversight by BC Coroner
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Use this field to indicate if the underlying reason for MAiD includes the additional review criteria set out by the BC Coroner Service (i.e. MAiD Request may have been made due to an accident, violence, or self-inflicted injury that occurred, and/or MAiD was provided in a mental health facility or correctional facility (or patient was transferred to a Hospital from one of these facilities and received MAID))
CustomField.label: Potential BCCS Review
